item.description:
Traditional late summer party for the group at the usual place in New Hampshire. Location is a private house so it will only be disclosed by email when you RSVP. Location has pool and large garden. You may wish to bring some food and drink.
No particular format but most people there will be libertarian-ish. There will also be young children, so some moderation will be appreciated.
[Gavin can offer a limited number of lifts from Boston - email directly.]

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Late Summer Party
